name: Appcore Labs
tagline: Seasoned App developers with business minds.
description:
Appcore labs is not your typical Development company. We have years of experience in leading successful ventures from startup all the way though acquisition. Along with building world class products, we guide our clients through the process of developing a solid road map, managing maintenance, structuring for a sale, and integrating to our growing tech community. We work with all custom mobile app and web projects from the idea phase through development and deployment. 
We are highly focused in our region to build the companies of the future through technology.
